question:
Last Wednesday you flew from London to Vancouver. When you arrived home, you discovered that you had left your hand luggage on the plane.


Write a letter to the airline. In your letter, you should explain:where and when you lost your bagwhat your bag looks likewhat its contents were
text: Hello ,I Ward Andy would like to inform you that last Wednesday I travelled  from London to Vancouver.I had lost my handbag.And I don't remember properly because I was in rush hour.
Firstly,I remember my seat number N346 and I kept my handbag under the seat near my leg because there wasn't sufficient space.

Secondly,I had been carrying this bag everywhere when I travel because it is one of my favourites beg which I received from my sister.furthermore,It is branded one popularly  known as 'Gucci '.It is in brown colour and zipped with a small chain .And the size of the bag will be a small size which is portable.
Thirdly,moreover,I carry this beg for my personal things .For instance,hand perfume,face cream and sanitiser pads and my contact lens.
Therefore,I would like to request kindly return my beg to my address Vancouver street vein  554 .Kindly contact my number 729405 if my beg is found .
